title: Phase 2: Relationships & Graph
description: Graph visualization using force-directed layout, interactive matrix reports, BIA (Business Impact Analysis) engine with basic scoring, relationship validation rules, and bulk relationship import functionality.

title: Phase 4: Intelligence & Automation
description: 6R Decision Engine for migration strategy recommendations (Retire, Rehost, Replatform, Refactor, Repurchase, Retain), advanced Excel import with AI-powered mapping, Pustaka ITAM integration with live sync, and AI-powered insights.

title: Dual-Write Consistency (SAGA Pattern)
description: Implement SAGA pattern with compensating transactions to ensure PostgreSQL and Neo4j stay in sync. Rollback Postgres if Neo4j write fails. Log failures for manual investigation. See ADR-004 in docs/07-architecture-decision-records.md

title: BIA (Business Impact Analysis) Engine
description: Implement configurable scoring engine with multiple aggregation strategies (MAX, Weighted Average, SUM). Topology-aware scoring using fan-in degree from Neo4j. Support custom scoring profiles. See docs/03-logic-scoring-profile.md

title: Card CRUD API with JSONB Support
description: Build REST endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting cards. Implement unified upsert (PATCH /cards/{id}) handling both SQL columns and JSONB attributes atomically. See docs/05-api-spec.md

title: Relationship CRUD with Smart Edges
description: API endpoints for creating relationships with properties: id, valid_from, valid_to, status, description, allocation_pct. Implement acyclic hierarchy checks for PARENT_OF relationships. See docs/02-relationship-spec.md

title: PostgreSQL & Neo4j Database Schema
description: Implement hybrid data model with PostgreSQL cards table (SQL columns + JSONB attributes) and Neo4j graph nodes/edges. Create indexes, constraints, and migration scripts. See docs/04-sql-ddl.md and docs/01-metamodel-spec.md

title: Phase 3: Advanced Visualizations
description: Landscape Heatmap using D3 Treemap for hierarchical visualization, Time Machine Roadmap with Gantt chart and date slider, TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) engine with recursive cost rollup, and PDF/PowerPoint export capabilities.

title: Bulk Relationship Import
description: Excel/CSV import wizard for bulk relationship creation. Auto-map columns to source/target cards. Validate relationship types. Show preview with error detection before committing.

title: Card List View with Faceted Filters
description: Build frontend list view with server-side pagination, column sorting, and multi-select faceted filters (Type, Lifecycle Phase, Tags, custom JSONB fields). See docs/06-uiux-sitemap.md

title: Graph Visualization (Force-Directed)
description: Build D3.js or ReactFlow force-directed graph visualization. Display nodes (cards) and edges (relationships). Support centering on selected node, depth control, and interactive navigation.

title: Core Platform & Infrastructure
description: Polyglot persistence architecture (PostgreSQL 16, Neo4j 5, Redis 7), Rust backend with Axum framework, React + Shadcn UI frontend, Docker/Kubernetes deployment, monitoring, logging, and security hardening.

title: Interactive Matrix Report
description: Build X/Y grid heatmap (e.g., Business Capabilities vs Applications). Cells clickable to drill into intersection density. Support filtering, sorting, and CSV export. See docs/06-uiux-sitemap.md

title: Metamodel Rules Engine
description: Implement validation engine for JSONB attributes. Support regex patterns, required fields, enum values, and custom validation rules per card type. Store rules in metamodel_rules table. See docs/01-metamodel-spec.md

title: JWT Authentication & RBAC
description: Implement JWT-based stateless authentication with access/refresh tokens. Role-based access control with Viewer, Editor, Admin roles. Authorization middleware for API endpoints. See docs/05-api-spec.md

title: Audit Trail & History
description: Implement audit_log table to track all card changes. Build history view with timeline showing diff between old and new values. Support revert functionality for admins.

title: Phase 1: Foundation - MVP Core
description: Core database setup, card CRUD operations, metamodel validation engine, list view with faceted filters, basic JWT authentication, and audit trail. Foundation for all subsequent phases.
